name: Package deals (MESOs)
summary: Present 2–3 packages you would accept, each optimized differently, to reveal priorities and move away from single-issue haggling.
goal: Increase agreement probability and value by trading across issues instead of fighting on one number.
counterparty_guidance: Evaluate packages for your priorities, not just theirs.
Do not choose among options if all favor them; propose your own.
Use packages to surface their preferences and demand balance.
Ask for a comparison that clarifies trade-offs.

ui.card_summary: Present 2–3 packages you would accept, each optimized differently, to reveal priorities and move away from single-issue haggling.

online_reference.title: MESO Negotiation: The Benefits of Making Multiple Equivalent Simultaneous Offers (PON)
